item.title: Making items donator only Delta (317)
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“dazi, post:1, topic:401057”]start with open Client.java then search for if(wearID == 6570 && killedJad == 0){
or you fire cape id to you see something like
if(wearID == 6570 && killedJad == 0){
sM(“You must have defeated TzTok-Jad to wear this cape.”);
return false;
}
copy it and paste it under the last }
then change killedJad to donator
then change 6570 to you id of your item.
then change
“You must have defeated TzTok-Jad to wear this cape.”
to the message that comes if you isent donator
like “You must be donator to wear this cape.” now you done hope it helped[/quote]

Thank you for taking effort, But there already soms tuts out about this

item.title: Making items donator only Delta (317)
item.dc:creator: @dazi dazi
item.description:
@dazi wrote:

start with open Client.java then search for if(wearID == 6570 && killedJad == 0){
or you fire cape id to you see something like
if(wearID == 6570 && killedJad == 0){
sM(“You must have defeated TzTok-Jad to wear this cape.”);
return false;
}
copy it and paste it under the last }
then change killedJad to donator
then change 6570 to you id of your item.
then change
“You must have defeated TzTok-Jad to wear this cape.”
to the message that comes if you isent donator
like “You must be donator to wear this cape.” now you done hope it helped

Read full topic
